His music spans many genres, including prog rock, pop, singer-songwriter, electronic, folk, jazz, ambient, Celtic, classical, and soundtracks. Zuffanti has also written a book, "O casta musica" (2012), and the rock operas "Merlin" and "The rime of the ancient mariner".

All compositions are instrumental, but sampled voices are used on occasion.
